mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT cinema_name FROM mooc_cinema_t c WHERE c.`uuid` = fie.cinema_id) AS cinemaName, fie.hall_name AS hallName, (SELECT film_name FROM mooc_film_t f WHERE f.`uuid` = fie.film_id) AS filmName, (SELECT show_name FROM mooc_hall_dict_t d WHERE d.`uuid` = fie.hall_id) AS hallTypeName, fie.begin_time AS beginTime, fie.end_time AS endTime, fie.price AS filmPrice FROM mooc_field_t fie ${ew.customSqlSegment}
